source_sentence: 大慧普覺禪師偈頌卷第十一
translation: Verse Verses of the Chan Master Dahui Pujue, Vol. 11

source_sentence: 徑山能仁禪院住持嗣法
translation: Subharma, abbot of the Nengren Seonwon in Keng San

source_sentence: 慧日禪師臣蘊聞　上進
translation: Huiri chanshi xinmun wen shōjin
Verse of the Emperor's Promotion to the Hall of the Constructed House
"He opens the eye at the top of his head.
It illuminates the great chiliocosm.
He's become the king of all dharmas.
He's attained mastery over the Dharma.
He also composed a verse.
"Great are his faculties, great are his abilities, and great is his strength.
He bears the burden of great matters and doesn't seek permanence.
A single hair on his head penetrates his message.
The whole world is clearly and unobstructed.'
The imperial preceptor bestowed true praise developed four verses.
"Birth and death don't cease.
It's like the moon in the water.
It's impossible to grasp.
The marvel lies in discernment.
It's always abiding and never abiding.
This is the true and real meaning.
It's a single panel of blue paint.
It reflects the heavens and reflects the earth.
Perfectly enlightened emptiness is clear.
It's a Hu Laihan manifestation.
A single speck of spiritual light.
Ten thousand transformations and a thousand changes.
It follows things everywhere they appear.
The whole world is contoured and cleared.
Unmoving, his demeanor is unmoving.
His breath swallows Xiang Yu.

source_sentence: 泉州惠安縣迎藏經請小參偈
translation: Verse for Inviting a Small Audience to the Welcome Collection Sutra in Huian County, Quanzhou
"I bow my head to the great guide of the ten powers.
He's the sole honored one in the three realms with peerless abilities.
He shows us the accomplishment of Buddhahood and turns the wheel of the Dharma.
He widely expounds the limitless ocean of scriptures.
The minds of sentient beings are distinct in their perceptions and thoughts.
There are also differences in the Dharma wheels that are turned.
The merit of the wheel of the Dharma is immeasurable.
There's nothing that can be fathomed by exhausting thought and effort.
There's a large sūtra scroll that's contained in a single particle.
It's equal in volume to 3,000 great thousand worlds.
There are clever, wise, and insightful people in the world.
With the divine eye, he fully knows and sees it.
He destroys the dust and produces sūtras to do Buddha-works.
He doesn't conceptualize what's real and what's not real.
He also takes the emptiness of the limitless Dharma realm.
It's collected in a single pore of the Buddha's body.
It's surrounded by Sumeru's iron ring and the ocean.
Each one contains nothing that's constricted.
Once this is true of one pore, the others are all the same.
The guiding teacher's skillful means are likewise.
Each moment of mindfulness universally penetrates every pore.
With each thought, he fully realizes the adamantine wisdom.
With each thought, he accomplishes Buddha's enlightenment.
With each thought, he fulfills the vow of Samantabhadra.
But he doesn't give rise to the mind of conceptualization.
Nor does he abide in the profound realm.
He's like a dream, like an illusion, like the moon in the water.
Like the udumbara flower, it emerges from the world.
Thus, he always turns the great roll of sūtras.
'I fully understand that there's no one who turns or is turned.'
The buddhas, bodhisattvas, and gods of the three times.
śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, gods, and humans.
hells, asuras, ghosts, animals, and so forth.
Each and every one of them receives the power of this sūtra.
Now, I'll again join with the children of the buddhas.
Each one gives rise to a mind of special and difficult encounter.
We'll gather this sūtra and return it to the dust.
We'll abide in the treasury of the Dharma treasure of Vairocana.

source_sentence: 莊泉伯檢察為先安撫請陞堂偈
translation: Verse in which Uncle Zhuangquan examines and requests the prior pacifier to be promoted to the hall.
Recently, people who train as buddhas have become less and less mistaken.
They rarely see things that aren't mistaken.
They only strive to accumulate resources and discuss authority.
They abandon the great and settle for the small.
They ignore what's straightforward.
They beat around it from the outside.
After all, that's the one move.
How could it ever be understood?
There's only the Layman Zhuang.
He's true and genuine, without false pretenses.
He removes the root of affliction.
A blazing fire burns dry grass.
Once the mind ground is peaceful.
How could the demonic realm disturb it?
Let it be as noisy and rambunctious as you like.
I'll always be quiet.
At the end, I'll show my true nature and return.
He's like taking off a torn cloth coat.
He crosses his legs and enters meditative concentration.
The bright white moon is facing the clear marsh.
He passes through the barrier of birth and death.
He shatters priceless treasures.
He's a rigid, upright man.
Once he understands everything, he fully comprehends it.

source_sentence: 方敷文請陞堂舉那吒太子因緣
translation: Mr. Fang Shifen asked to be promoted to the hall to cite Prince Naṭa's causes and conditions.
"All his bones and flesh were returned to his parents.
He doesn't know which one is Naṭa.
He turns over on his head by a hair.
Each hair is not different from the other.
Zhao Digong's verse inviting him to be promoted to the hall
The first part of the sentence recommends that he has reached the end of the earth.
After the sentence, he acknowledges that the road will be open.
One strike against the iron barrier is like a smash.
The water and sky are wide and the geese are slanted.

source_sentence: 李參政轉物菴(并引泰發)
translation: Li Ziansheng chanwu an (with a quotation from Taifa)
"The old man Yue Jiang.
The tablet calls the room where he lives the transformation of things.

source_sentence: 蓋取首楞嚴若能轉物即同如來之義。
translation: He took the meaning of Śūraṃgama, which is that if one can transform things, they are the same as the Tathāgata.
The caller asked for an inscription.
Miao Xi Zonggao inscribed it, saying.
"If one can transform things, they're the same as the Tathāgata.
"Duh! The Gautama can intimidate the foolish.
'Things lack self-nature, and I don't exist.'
Who is it that transforms it? It's a vain effort on the part of the mind and hand.
What else is it to know that it has no self-nature?
Glancing up at the dust of sentient beings, they honestly speculate about the emptiness of bones.
'Who is this person who lives in this Ām and does nothing to create?'
He has the eye of the gate of the apex and tries to discern the close and the distant.

source_sentence: 富樞密妙高堂(并引季申)
translation: Fushū Mimimigakudo (and quoting Jishen)
*Śumitra Fugong.
He read the great teaching of Huayan.
He enjoyed playing in the ocean of Vairocana's nature.
His abode was called the Hall of Marvelous Heights.

source_sentence: 蓋取法界勝樂妙高之義作自受用佛事。
translation: It's called the Hall of Marvelous Heights, which takes the meaning of the overwhelming bliss of the Dharma realm and the marvelous heights as a self-enjoying Buddhist service.
He asked for an inscription in writing.
Miao Xi mou inscribed it, saying.
"The hall of marvelous heights follows where it goes.
It's the second one that's not yet hung up by the sign.
It's like a fierce flame hiding a gnat.
'I think I'll give rise to a false conception.'
"Dewon Master An has created this.
He's broad and wide even at a different peak.
What is the trustworthy purpose of staying in the Buddha's land?
I'll write an inscription that will lead to a multitude of accomplishments.
Jingshinkaku, Minister Wei (Bangda)
"It's great, vast, and tranquil.
It's like space that doesn't discriminate.
When we contemplate the mind and seek purity, we become defiled.
It's even more so than in the case of the buddha lands.
It's also like the things you see in a dream.
Although what's seen may be existent, it's not desirable.
Thus, he comprehends it without doubt.
The meaning of a pure mind clearly appears.
Its meaning is so clear that it's difficult to measure.
It's beyond all forms and characteristics and free from language.
It's in the past, future, and present worlds.
buddhas, bodhisattvas, and śrāvakas.
All sentient beings who contain consciousnesses are of the same type.
They equally understand the meaning as it really is.
It's wonderful, extraordinary, and beyond measure.
He teaches this meaning only from this hall.
After he teaches it, he then calms down and follows its objects.
There's no difference between them and what happened in the dream.
'By the mouth of a person born from a father and mother, I've explained this unsurpassed marvelous kārttika.
I taught this unsurpassed marvelous kāraṇḍa.
"Adorned is the vast, tranquil mind.
I will create benefits for those who come.

source_sentence: 向侍郎無熱軒(并引伯恭)
translation: Xiang Siren Wuheixuan (also quoted by Bogong)
Gṛhapati Xianglin.
In the garden where he lived.
He built a heatless pavilion near the pond.
He would build a contemplation of continuous illumination on the northern Tai.

source_sentence: 取華嚴無熱大龍王宮流出四河華林寶樹接影連輝之義。
translation: He took the meaning of the Huayan Wuhei great dragon king palace flowing out of the four rivers, the Huayilin precious trees, and the continuous illumination of their images.
Legu Han Company remonstrated with him to write this account.

source_sentence: 居士來索鄙語乃說是偈。
translation: When the householder asked for some humble words, he spoke this verse.
"His vigorous and diligent effort exceeds that of a great many people.
He's called the Great Layman of Xianglin.
He abides in a place of true reality that's changeless.
He always practices the Buddha's teachings with consistency.
He doesn't do worldly mistaken actions.
He accomplishes excellent supramundane skillful means.
Within this method, he's able to conjure up unfathomable objects.
He conjures up inconceivable objects.
And within that inconceivable realm.
They then manifest various extraordinary things.
A forest of flowers and precious trees all emit light.
They are connected by shadow, and their radiance is reflected in each other.
Their luster is pure like adamant.
There's nothing in the world that can destroy it.
It's also like a large, heatless, jeweled lake.
On all sides, it flows into the ocean.
That ocean is vast and limitless.
It doesn't emanate from a single pore of the householder's body.
In that one pore, he emits a bright light.
Eighty-four thousand of them are emitted at the same time.
It's not necessary for the householder to change the shape of his tongue.
He simply proclaims the wondrous Dharma with this light.
'This teaching is this light!'
It's not separate from this light that he explains this teaching.
The same is true of the great ocean's pores.
This is the meaning of the nonheating nature of the forest of Gandhāra.
This meaning is like space that can't be measured.
One by one, it encompasses worldly characteristics.
Now, I'll use this meaningless speech.
I'll briefly offer this layman my hand.
'The son of the Buddha has come to ascend to the Pavilion of No Heat.'
Jewels of marvelous sand open the door.
Cai Zhixian xiao'an (with quotations)
"The Layman Pleasant lived there.
He took up residence at the summit of Nanyue.
He named it after the Lesser Vehicle.

source_sentence: 蓋取石頭和尚菴雖小含法界之義。
translation: It was named after the monk Shitou, even though his anam was small and contained the meaning of the Dharma realm.
The monk wanted me to write his name on the tablet.
He then spoke this verse.
"This Ām is neither small nor large.
It's a laughing stock that Shitou made up of nothing.
He didn't know that the Dharma realm was this Ām.
He was so bold as to say that this Ām contains the Dharma realm.
Now, I want to know who lives in this Ām.
He's alone among all the elephants, revealing his body.
Myōkai wrote the tablet for this Ām.
He wanted to be close to Taixu.
Wang Zhuyuan Yanxuan xuan (Shengxi)
"He doesn't show his body and mind in the three realms.
How could he have raised his boat like this?
I'd like to send a message to someone sitting calmly in a caravan.
'I'd like to see the new moon descend into the front squabble.'
Han Shikaku Legu
"People say that the valley of ultimate bliss is here.
Who believes that bliss is displaced by the valley?
He gives even happiness to those who don't enjoy it.
That's called a truly delightful man child.
Sixth Heaven Hall
"This is not the source of the Dharma that's profound and unshakeable.
Don't tire of the existence of nominal names when the situation arises.
It's only after an exceedingly large number of heroic men.
He then enters the vast gate of limitlessness.
The myriad objects that intersect the universe are never two.
The six elements are never dimmed by day or night.
He often reflects on the fact that there's no distinction between the affairs of Pang and Lao.
Does he throw his sword and wave it through the air without a trace?
Tongxian an
"The absence of self-nature in dust conceals its true establishment.
Even when it's intended to harmonize its light, it's both lost.
What's outside is not wide, and what's inside is not stifled.
This meaning is neither false nor real.
The master in his mansion is like jade handling stone.
He observes it like this for a thousand years and one breath.
It's a metaphor for the director's observation of my mansion (Zicai).
All things are available to me.
I've never stopped observing them.
The wise man goes back to looking at me.
He attains freedom in both vertical and horizontal directions.
Wong Chi Tong Jushi Shanzhuan
"He's a person who well lives in an anus.
He's never had any place to stay.
This is the only mind that's unstuck.
This is the place where he settles down.
Xie Zhiyan jushi (Zhang Siren)
Ziyan shared a cup of tea with Jianqiao.
Myōkai replied with a shirt from Qingzhou.
"He got a man to return a cow to a horse.
The first three threes and the last three threes.
Answer to Liu Anfu (Fang Ming)
"A message is transmitted from a hair cone and seed.
It's just like cutting off knowledge in dead languages.
In the latter part of the night, there's a full moon in the realm of emptiness.
Its clear light is shared by a thousand miles of reliance.
A Visit to the Householder of Immaculate Conception (Squire Zhang)
The jade pond in the upper garden is not yet thawed.
Here among humans, the willows are again dropping in spring.
He sits in the mountain hall burning incense all day.
I'll always remember the many mouths of people in Vaiśālī.
Showing Master Wang (Nanzhao)
There's no limit to the blaze on a single hair of his head.
He determines that consciousness is difficult to fathom.
It's straightforward and doesn't give rise to wrong or dangerous views.
The sun and moon in the pot will naturally grow.
He showed Zhou Zicong how to write the Flower Ornament Sutra.
"He generalizes and differentiates similarities and differences, forming and destroying practices and distributing them.
The perfect interpenetration of dust and unobstructed entry into the many bases.
What's not wide is the bases entering all the dust and not narrow.
The end of the householder's brush proclaims the ocean of fruitfulness.
The cause originates in the verse I now speak.
"I praise the shared realization of the single true reality realm.
He showed Layman Leyuan (and held it up).
Zheng Weiran of Changle Shakeng.
He didn't rely on his original part to engage in meditation.
He says he's reached the point of no participation.
Krakucchanda Miliṇḍinya.
He showed Han Enryo (Tze-Cang's residence)
"He says, 'There's nowhere to attach a phrase.'
It cuts off a thousand different paths before the wind.
Transcending the buddhas and surpassing the ancestors is only now.
The wall stands at ten thousand feet without turning back.
Showing Elder of Great Compassion
"One blow broke through the cave of birth and death.
At the time, worldlings and sages cut off their tracks.
He went back to Zhaozhou laughing, never stopping his mind.
Old age still takes him east and west.
Showing Elder Xiangyun Yi
"He took away the monk's staff.
He then had no tricks at that moment.
He drank down the iron eye and suddenly opened it straight.
It was said on the summit of Thousand Prong.
He showed the Chan master Dingqi.
"He holds his sublime eye at the entrance of his face.
A life-snatching talisman hangs diagonally from the back of his elbow.
He's blind and has the talisman for liberation.
Zhaozhou hung a gourd on the east wall.
He showed Meiguang Chanren.
"He smiles when he picks up a turtle's hair.
With one blow, a thousand barriers and locks are opened.
Today is the day we rejoice in our ordinary lives.
Who has earned my coming for a thousand miles?
Showing Seonin Zuyuan
"He liberates his body at the top of a 10,000-foot cliff.
He still rises, yet he's still in a state of tranquility.
Nothing happens when he's hungry and thirsty.
Then he'll say that the person in the past wasn't the person in the past.
He showed Zunpu Chanshiren
"In one gulp, he swallowed up the buddhas of the three times.
He's exactly the kind of guest I'd make into a child.
It's just like Pu Chan, which has no use.
With a single hair on his head, he forgets his faculties.
He showed Squire Faquan
"The Buddha and ancestors were overtaken before the words were spoken.
The sun is exactly at noon.
He opens the three important gates.
With one blow, he beats the drum of poisonous substances.
Since he's given rise to the highest level of discernment.
Don't ask about the thousand-pronged crossbow.
It's released without obstruction.
It's a cluster that doesn't go back and forth.
"Gee, old Gautama!
Stay, stay, stay, stay!
Showing the Ubiquitous Chan Man
"He doesn't [speak*repeat] before dotting his head.
He's already made a fool of himself by not pointing and turning.
How could he drum up two more pieces of skin?
How could he not just dig into the sky and open the door?
A wooden horse in the fire cries out in vain.
At the bottom of the water, a mud cow roars.
Listen to my words as I use meditation and apply meditation.
'You must let go when you reach the precipice.'
Sending off the Chan Master Zhizen
"He directly exits and enters, and he directly practices and sits.
This is what the Chan master directly requires.
He's originally perfected without establishing a task.
When he's hungry, he eats his food, and when it's cold, he goes to the fire.
He's not in the Gautama or Skandharma.
Anyone who contemplates this will end up in trouble.
I've said this and it's fallen through in my mouth.
It's a fallacy of words before a discerning eye.
Please serve these words without forgetting the bones and trembling.
Sending off the bell for the transformation of the master of the Dharma wheel Sizang
"The covering becomes a bell, and the elevation becomes a cauldron.
This is the style of the Wheel of the Dharma family.
Marvelous joyful people dare to roam about.
He was certainly invited by those who wanted to meditate.
He suddenly realized it when he was facing the paper with his felt pencil.
With a single sound, he directly penetrated the summit of Sumeru.
Sending off the superintendent monk, Kan.
"When the bottom of the bucket is removed, the earth is vast.
Where his life root is severed, the turquoise pool is cleared.
He then spreads a bit of snow from his red stove.
Scatter it as a lamp that illuminates the night among humans.
A Message to Elder Fusheng
The true man's eighteen realms are originally empty.
Thirty-one people of the same family name are called Lui.
They scatter and wander the mountains, each occupying a mountain.
Thirty-one people also share the same place.
Sending a letter of thanks to the Zong Huayin Chan master
"He sits at the highest peak of the Golden Wheel, cutting it off.
Thousands of demons and a hundred monsters stalk it on their own.
It's been years since he got the real news again.
He explained that Yangqi's correct lineage was penetrated.
Sending Elder Lemming back to Changlu
"People say that a filial son emerges from the head of a stick.
I say, 'Pity the child who doesn't feel ugly.'
Thus did Elder Changlu come.
"Miao Xi paid an empty visit.
He taught the four seas to spread the teaching falsely.
Nāgârjuna could make the lion's roar.
Who says there's nothing to give to him?
He drank down the iron ring of mountains and walked away backwards.

source_sentence: 大慧普覺禪師偈頌卷第十一
translation: Chan Master Dahui Pujue's Verses, Volume 11
